home.aboutUsTitle: Are you a student or a teacher?
home.aboutUsContent: Virtual Tutor offers a versatile experience for both teachers and students. If you are a teacher, you can use our platform to create courses, providing your students with an enriching learning experience. If you are a student, our application allows you to access a wide range of courses and ask questions related to their content.
home.unlockPotential: Unlock your potential and achieve your educational goals in a smart and efficient way!
home.buttonText: How would you like to continue?
